ygData.subject: Re: Questions??????
ygData.msgSnippet: ... bridge in ... to fall ... item on ... when I run ... and move ... to make ... Sense I first posted this thread, I was shown a way to improve the safe fall
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Techpriest" <techpriest@o...>
wrote:
> I also have a human monk and train Safe Fall by falling. I find a
bridge in
> the Plane of Knowledge (no monsters) and figure out how high I need
to fall
> from to take damage, but as little damage as possible. I drop an
item on
> that spot, shruiken usually, so that I know where to jump off at
when I run
> back up. A while of that and I stop taking damage from that level
and move
> the item up the bridge. I don't usually have to fall to many times
to make
> it raise a point.

Sense I first posted this thread, I was shown a way to improve the
safe fall with less work. Go to any place that has steep mountain
sides that you can walk up and go to the top. Then simply run
down . You will slip and fall many times on the way down. I took my
skill from a 6 to 75 in no time.
